data.name: Raifu Wars - Lucznik Character
data.detailed_description:
Unlock Lucznik as a new playable character in Raifu Wars! Hailing from Poland, she boasts deadly close range attack and quick respawns but beware her fragility.

Features an all-new character with art, music, and voice acting.
data.about_the_game:
Unlock Lucznik as a new playable character in Raifu Wars! Hailing from Poland, she boasts deadly close range attack and quick respawns but beware her fragility.

Features an all-new character with art, music, and voice acting.
data.short_description: Unlock Lucznik as a new playable character in Raifu Wars!
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, Polish, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64-bit x86 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed for at least 1280 x 720 screen resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mavericks (OSX 10.9)
  • Processor: Intel chipset
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed for at least 1280 x 720 screen resolution
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu/Linux Mint/Debian
  • Processor: 64-bit x86 CPU
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant graphics
  • Additional Notes: Designed for at least 1280 x 720 screen resolution
